summary: Please remove this mod if you have it installed and wait for RevampedFires coming soon!
descriptionHtml:
This file has been removed by me.
It was like too much hard work placing so many actors in the world and was causing some graphical glitches and incompatibility with other mods.
Please wait for a new version of this mod call RevampedFires which I,m currently working on that will simply replace the vanilla meshes with new ones that have a fire damage actor attached to them.

Cheers and thanks for your support!

Greg Manthey - gargorias
author: Greg Manthey - gargorias
